title: 怎样重置地狱
author: ff98sha
txt_content:
删除region文件夹中的DIM-0即可
抱歉是Dim-1文件夹

replies.txt_content: 删除minecraft.----saves----你要重置地狱的地图-----删除DIM-1

replies.author: ff98sha
replies.txt_content:
玖123 发表于 2017-5-1 17:40
是在minecraft.文件夹里吗
.minecraft/saves/存档名/DIM-1 的整个DIM-1文件夹
